code: import React,{useState,props,useEffect}from'react';import'./guide.css';import SearchList from'./SearchList';import{faUnlock}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import TripList from'./TripList';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Guide(){const[loctrips,setLocTrips]=useState([]);const[show,setShow]=useState(false);const[filteredData,setFilteredData]=new useState(loctrips);useEffect(()=>{fetch('http://127.0.0.1:5000/guide',{'method':'GET',headers:{'content-Type':'application/json'}}).then(resp=>resp.json()).then(resp=>setLocTrips(resp)).catch(error=>console.log(error));},[]);function handleShow(){setShow(true);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"gheader",children:"Tourist Guide Page, Find nearby tourist here"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"show",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-success",onClick:handleShow,children:"Show Trips"})}),show?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"show",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text",children:"Fetching trips for your destination...."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchList,{loctrips:loctrips,show:show,filteredData:filteredData})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{})]});}export default Guide;
